akn:section.akn:heading: Indian Health Service and Department of Veterans Affairs health facilities and services sharing

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Feasibility study and report The Secretary shall examine the feasibility of entering into an arrangement for the sharing of medical facilities and services between the Indian Health Service and the Department of Veterans Affairs and shall, in accordance with subsection (b), prepare a report on the feasibility of such an arrangement and submit such report to the Congress by no later than September 30, 1990.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Nonimpairment of service quality, eligibility, or priority of access

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Nonimpairment of service quality, eligibility, or priority of access The Secretary shall not take any action under this section or under subchapter IV of chapter 81 of title 38 which would impair—

(d) Right to health services Nothing in this section may be construed as creating any right of a veteran to obtain health services from the Indian Health Service except as provided in an agreement under subsection (c).
